title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5008.3 - Transfer to another public retirement system in this State
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5008.3 - Transfer to another public retirement system in this State

State Regulations
(a) A member of this system who is also a
member of another public retirement system in this State shall be eligible to
transfer his/her membership in this system to such other retirement system, provided that: (1)
s/he withdraws from this
system; (2)
at the time of
withdrawal s/he notifies this system, in writing, of his/her intention to
transfer; (3)
within one year of
withdrawal, the member's accumulated contributions in this system are deposited
with the other retirement system by this system or by the member, as
applicable. (b) A member
who withdraws from this system prior to joining another public retirement
system in this State shall be eligible to transfer his/her membership in this
system to such other retirement system, provided that: (1)
s/he gives written notice to this system, at the time s/he withdraws, of his/her intention to become a member of the
other system; and
(2)
within one
year of withdrawal, the member's accumulated contributions in this system are
deposited with the other retirement system by this system or by the member, as
applicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5008.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
